alert.note: Alert for Lower Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 15 at 4:56AM MST until February 15 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. Light snow and wind may cause near white out conditions. * WHERE...In Colorado, Lower Yampa River Basin. In Utah, Eastern Uinta Basin. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Blowing and drifting snow will make travel difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.
